title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.5.32 | 08-10-2021
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: O Brahmana Vyasa Deva, it is decided by the learned that the best remedial measure for removing all troubles and miseries is to dedicate one's activities to the service of the Supreme Lord Personality of God.
segments.summary: The speaker introduces the verse from Srimad Bhagavatam, stating that dedicating activities to the Supreme Lord is the best way to remove troubles and miseries.

segments.key_quote: But please understand that happiness experienced in material existence, which is called as material happiness, is described in the scriptures as simply another form of misery only.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that material happiness is ultimately another form of misery, arising from the contact of senses with sense objects.

segments.key_quote: To dedicate one's activities to the service of the Supreme Lord Personality of God.
segments.summary: The speaker reiterates that dedicating all activities to Krishna is the best remedial measure for removing miseries.

segments.key_quote: But they do not know that without the sanction of the Supreme Lord, nobody can become free from miseries.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that freedom from misery requires the sanction of the Supreme Lord, drawing from Narada Muni's personal experience.

segments.key_quote: So, the point is that sanction of the Supreme Lord is very much necessary for the treatment to be effective.
segments.summary: The speaker provides examples of medical treatment and crossing a river to illustrate that the sanction of the Supreme Lord is necessary for success.

segments.key_quote: So, therefore, we should learn how to dedicate whatever activities we may do to the Supreme Lord.
segments.summary: The speaker emphasizes the importance of understanding the Lord's presence and power, and learning to dedicate all activities to Him, especially through studying how His energies work.

segments.key_quote: They should try to study how the energy of the Lord is working in every sphere of life.
segments.summary: The speaker explains how different individuals, such as scholars, scientists, and warriors, can dedicate their activities to the Lord, using Arjuna as an example.

segments.key_quote: Think always that the money which is accumulated is the wealth of the Lord.
segments.summary: The speaker discusses how businessmen and even those engaged in menial work can dedicate their activities to the Lord, emphasizing the importance of chanting Hare Krishna.

segments.key_quote: In this way, one can actually engage in the service of the Lord and that way become free from all miseries.
segments.summary: The speaker concludes by reiterating that engaging in the service of the Lord leads to freedom from misery and ends with Hare Krishna.
